channel.title: UID problem...Still
channel.description:
I got this problem in my project pearl (delta) , that if i change the uid needed (int expectedUid) to something and try to change the client signlink.java to the same it still says i need to be a member (if(!officialclient){ disconnected = true; })
I've tried many thing but always came to that "you need to be a member..." Btw:is it normal that now when somebody logs in with a wrong client it begins to slowly say: Null Null Null Null Null Null

item.title: UID problem...Still
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

I’m just trying to set that UID and found out that there is some system to it in my source + client but cannot find out how it works…
Any help here?

Read full topic

item.title: UID problem...Still
item.dc:creator: @_Joshua1 |Joshua|
item.description:
@_Joshua1 wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:5, topic:296190”][quote author=|Joshua| link=topic=392218.msg2920252#msg2920252 date=1250709948]
Why don’t you just remove it…
[/quote]
Wouldn’t work. try taking out your heart to see how you operate.[/quote]
The point of that post was? So your trying to say removing a UID is going to destroy a server? Thats like saying you can edit how hard you hit when you have no weapon in item.cfg (one of your theories).
